Detailed Description

template<class T>
class oos::attribute_reader< T >

Set an attribute value of an serializable.

Template Parameters
TThe type of the attribute to set.

A given attribute value of a template type is tried to set into an serializable. Therefor the attribute with given name must be found and the value must be convertible into the objects attribute.
